name: Great West Way Discoverer Global 7 Day Pass (7 days)
description: GREAT WEST WAY DISCOVERER GLOBAL PASS Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for 7 consecutive days centred around the Great West Way. Bus travel in the area is also included. The Great West Way® is a 125-mile touring route between London, Bath and Bristol based on ancient routes. It allows travel between London Paddington and Bristol Temple Meads via Chippenham; London Waterloo to Bristol Temple Meads via Salisbury and Westbury; Reading to Westbury via Pewsey; Westbury to Frome; Swindon to Westbury and the Thames Valley branch lines to Windsor & Eton Central, Marlow and Henley-on-Thames. The following bus routes are also included: X2 and X32 between Oxford and Wantage – Thames Travel, Connector service X38/X39 & X40, Reading, Henley, Wallingford, Oxford – Thames Travel, River Rapids service. X5 Salisbury, Amersbury, Pewsey, Marlborough, Swindon – Salisbury Reds service. Green Line services 702 and 703 between Heathrow, Windsor and LEGOLAND Windsor Resort. Reading Buses services excluding Greenwave, Kennections football and special event services. 49 Trans-Wilts-Express, Swindon, Trowbridge – Stagecoach West service. 55 Swindon, Royal Wootton Bassett, Chippenham – Stagecoach West GOLD service. S6 Swindon, Faringdon, Oxford – Stagecoach West GOLD service. 80/81 Swindon – Malborough – Stagecoach West service. All First West of England services except the Bristol Flyer services.
time_restrictions: Mon to Fri: valid from 09:20 until midnight except for departures from Paddington between 16:40-19:16 inclusive. No restrictions at weekends or bank holidays.

where_to_buy: Ticket Vending Machine (TVM): Some Northern, Avanti West Coast, and LNER TVMs sell these tickets (see notes)
Valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities
